channel.title: Some kind of "tick" issue
channel.description:
the issue is most apparent when fighting npcs but it is a server wide issue,
it seems every 1min or so the server "ticks" speed up / surge and while killing npcs about 10 hits happen in the space of 1 it is also apparent when mining a shooting star you get about 15 xp drops in the space of one,
would anyone know where to start looking to fix this

item.title: Some kind of "tick" issue
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

I would guess your processor cannot keep-up in this time. It does a surge to catch back up after the garbage collector does its duty. As all the server ticks are queued, they are to happen “at or after” a given time.

Read full topic
